1_17PhTjw3o2wPhxyKeM3Ss975eWZ1UMsjQC.body:
No, as far as I understand there isn't a way to recover the username once it's been deleted, besides recovering your users.json file.
As far as sharing the username across multiple computers you just need to copy the users.json to each computer and put it in the data folder of zeronet before you start it up.
